application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: G1 - All trees and shrubs encroaching on right of front garden, trim back to wall to tidy.G2 - Shrubs left, trim over to tidy, Prunus, reduce to previous points. Hazel, reduce to previous level.T1 - Laurel, left of patio, remove 2 front stems, reduce remainder by a maximum of 1 metre.T2 - Conifer, centre of left boundary, dismantle to near ground level and grind stump to 20cms below existing grade.T3 - Laurel, left boundary, end of borer, cut to fence height.G4 - Apple trees in same area , prune to good orchard practice.G5 - Dead/dying Elms, remove and grind stumps.G3 - Horse Chestnut closest to Holly, reduce 2-3 lower laterals by a maximum of 2.5 metres to clear over Holly. clip back lower branches of chestnuts growing into centre of garden.T4 - Cedar encroaching on right boundary, clip back lower laterals on left side of crown by maximum of 1 metre.For good tree management and to improve light and give clearance.
